resources.string: Shamisira kushandira kuti uwane maitiro ako apa.
Kana uchitanga nyaya mupfuura, unozouya pawoko pane pane.
Louise ndiwechidikitwa cheSpanish anogona kukusaidza kubvumira mhando yako!
Gabriel ndiye mupoto reFrench anogona kukubatsira kuendesa zvichida kuburitsa mubatiso!
Rakesh ndewekutanga wevadikaniko kana akadzungaira wako szvinzvimbo zvako!
Evelyn ndiwe munyori waBritish wechiremba anokugadzirisa nekukusimudzirawo muvhabati wako!
Ahsan ndiwo munyori wechisiyaratu yeArabu anokugadzira kuita zvakanakisisa vaviri venyu!
Min ndiye wemachina ngaari wezvaita zvako, anokutenderera kusarudza maitiro ako!
